verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. <S%H2502>Deliver<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>; <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>:
Who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>; <S%H3117>Continually<s%> do they gather themselves <S%H1481>together<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>.
They have <S%H8150>sharpened<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; <S%H5919>Adders<s%>' <S%H2534>poison<s%> is under their <S%H8193>lips<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>: Who have <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H1760>thrust<s%> aside my <S%H6471>steps<s%>.

The <S%H1343>proud<s%> have <S%H2934>hid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for <S%H2256>me<s%>, and cords; They have <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> by the <S%H3027>wayside<s%>; They have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H4170>gins<s%> for <S%H5542>me<s%>. [[Selah
I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Thou art my <S%H410>God<s%>: Give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

O <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5402>battle<s%>.

Grant <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3068>not<s%>, O Jehovah, the <S%H3970>desires<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; <S%H6329>Further<s%> not his evil <S%H2162>device<s%>, lest they <S%H7311>exalt<s%> <S%H5542>themselves<s%>. [[Selah
As for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those that compass me <S%H4524>about<s%>, Let the <S%H5999>mischief<s%> of their own <S%H8193>lips<s%> cover <S%H3680>them<s%>.
Let burning <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H4131>fall<s%> upon <S%H5307>them<s%>: Let them be cast into the <S%H784>fire<s%>, Into deep <S%H4113>pits<s%>, whence they shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%>.

An evil <S%H376>speaker<s%> shall not be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H7451>Evil<s%> shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to overthrow <S%H4073>him<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6213>maintain<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>, And <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H34>needy<s%>.
Surely the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: The <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
